pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conduct RISE Analysis // Implements techniques for educational resource inspection, selection, and evaluation (RISE) described in Bodily, Nyland, and Wiley (2017) doi:10.19173/irrodl.v18i2.2952. Automates the process of identifying learning materials that are not effectively supporting student learning in technology-mediated courses by synthesizing information about access to course content and performance on assessments.
